short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click is all it takes to start enjoying ZEE5 videos with your friends using this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel the zest of watching ZEE5 videos with your friends even when they are not around! This  ZEE5 Video Watch Party Chrome Extension lets you watch together, chat together in real time, and create a memorable shared experience all while being at home.

Key Features of this Chrome Extension

	One-Click Syncing: Get your ZEE5 videos in sync with your friends, it will play at the same time and no one will be out of sync.

	Real-Time Chat: In addition to the fun of watching, maintain a conversation with friends, making it a thrilling experience.

	Easy Party Creation: Watch a video together? It only takes one click and no additional complicated configurations to start a video watch party.

	Private & Secure: Watch your movies without stress as all the watched parties are private and personal.


How to Use in Simple Steps

Step 1: Installing the Extension
All you have to do is get the ZEE5 Video Watch Party extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Step 2: Launch application and Select a video.
Go to ZEE5 official website, login to your account and select the video that you wish to watch with friends.

Step 3: Create a Watch Party
Navigate to the extension icon in your browser and click on it and choose the option ‘Create Watch Party’ and this will create a unique link.

Step 4: Invite your friends
They will be able to join the watch party through the link that you give them. If they join they will be synchronised and the video will show when they join in.

Step 5: Enjoy Together
Just sit back, and turn on the shared video, and with the help of live chat, it is much more entertaining!

Why It Is Useful?
	Stay Connected: With everyone being busy and often in different locations, the ZEE5 Video Watch Party extension makes it easy to stay connected and share entertainment with friends and family, no matter where they are.

	Enhance Movie Nights: Gone are the days of simply watching alone. This extension transforms movie nights into an engaging, social experience, complete with synchronized playback and live chat.


Who It Is Useful For

•	Long-Distance Friends & Families: Ideal for the couple who would love to watch the same show, movie or live performance but has been separated by distance. Regardless of distance that may be in cities or countries, this extension makes you feel closer.

•	Movie Buffs & TV Show Fans: To be more specific, if you are a cinema or TV shows lover, or if you like to watch movies with friends, this extension is designed for you. It makes sharing your passion possible than ever.

•	Busy Individuals: Perfect for those who have no time to meet personally, but still desire to spend time together with friends watching a movie or TV show.


FAQs

1. Can this extension work on any browser?
As of now, the ZEE5 Video Watch Party extension only supports chrome but it can be made compatible with other browsers in the future.

2. I know that there is a cap to the number of friends that we can invite.
No, you can even invite friends to join your watch party and that makes it perfect especially when you are in big groups.

3. Is my video quality going to decrease during the watch party?
No, your video quality does not get affected in any way. It only synchronizes the playback without affecting the streaming quality in any way.
